sentence: Former Georgia Senator and loser to now Sen. John Osoff (D-GA) in last year's election runoff, David Purdue can't accept that more people voted for the other person.
author: Murjani Rawls
title: Georgia Gonna Georgia: GOP Gubernatorial Candidate David Perdue Calls For 'Election Police Unit'
